post:
Infinite Technologies is a verified member of The Hosting Code of Ethics™ Program. You can buy hosting services from us confidently.

You can host any type of website, regardless of its content. Private FTPs, forums, etc are all allowed to be hosted comfortabliy. Our servers are co-located in TM Net Data Center located in CyberJaya, Malaysia.

Our German servers are co-located at AtriCom Data-Center located in Fankfurt, Germany. It has a high bandwidth global multimedia communications platform with a 60 Gigabit digital fiber optic backbone, which is truly the best in all of Europe.

Whats Special With Our Service?
* All self owned servers. Independent of any other service provider.
* No content restriction. Host what you like - no talks.
* SSL Secured Client Management System. Your data is safe in our hands.
* Remain 100% anonymous. We don't want your name or telephone number!
* 99.96% Uptime trackrecord for 6 months straight. (check here)
* 0.45 average cluster load. Have your sites load in seconds!

Virtual Private Servers (VPS) Hosting powered by Virtuozzo/XenSource
Prices start at $45 / month with addons and upgrades available.

Dedicated Server Hosting housed in states of the art Data-Centers having over 60 Gbps through-put/
Prices start at $80 / month with addons and upgrades available.

Contact Details
